trans-unit.source: Provides the base authentication interface for retrieving credentials for Web client authentication.
trans-unit.target: 提供基底驗證介面，用於擷取 Web 用戶端驗證的認證。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.ICredentials> interface provides the <xref:System.Net.ICredentials.GetCredential%2A> method to objects that supply network credentials to applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.ICredentials>介面提供<xref:System.Net.ICredentials.GetCredential%2A>方法，以提供網路認證，以便應用程式的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to use the <xref:System.Net.ICredentials> interface.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何使用<xref:System.Net.ICredentials>介面。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that the client is providing authentication for.
The type of authentication, as defined in the <see cref="P:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.AuthenticationType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 驗證的型別，如同在 <see cref="P:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.AuthenticationType" /> 屬性中所定義的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> object that is associated with the specified URI, and authentication type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> 物件，這個物件與所指定的 URI 和驗證型別相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> that is associated with the specified URI and authentication type, or, if no credentials are available, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" />，與指定的 URI 和驗證類型相關聯，如果沒有可用的認證，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.ICredentials.GetCredential%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> instance that contains the credentials that are associated with the specified URI and authorization scheme.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.ICredentials.GetCredential%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>執行個體，其中包含與指定的 URI 和授權配置相關聯的認證。

trans-unit.source: When no credentials are available, the <xref:System.Net.ICredentials.GetCredential%2A> method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 當沒有認證可用時，<xref:System.Net.ICredentials.GetCredential%2A>方法會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following uses <xref:System.Net.ICredentials.GetCredential%2A> to retrieve a <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> instance.
